game.name: Squidview
game.shortDescription: Explore the world of White Shell Island, a tropical paradise. Romance islanders, decorate your dream house, fish exotic creatures, grow lush plant life, and cook unique dishes. Customize your islander, pursue hobbies, and discover secrets. Live however you see fit. The world is in your hands!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the world of White Shell Island, a tropical paradise. Romance islanders, decorate your dream house, fish exotic creatures, grow lush plant life, and cook unique dishes. Customize your islander, pursue hobbies, and discover secrets. Live however you see fit. The world is in your hands!
